entries.meaning: the benefit or regard of someone or something
examples: But it will be for your sake that we'll undertake to refute this thesis, [â€¦]

entries.meaning: (obsolete except in phrases) contention, strife; guilt, sin, accusation or charge
examples: And unto Adam He said, Because thou hast hearkened unto the voice of thy wife, and hast eaten of the tree, of which I commanded thee, saying, Thou shalt not eat of it: cursed is the ground for thy sake; in sorrow shalt thou eat of it all the days of thy life.
